Subject: need help configuring web based reports
Description: can't get it working on local machine name, localhost, or the cert we have created that is set in the reporting settings.
Solution_Comment__c:
[Issue]
Customer is looking to secure the Published Reports site

[Resolution]
1. Bind the certificate to port 8082
2. Adjust the %SAInstallDir%WebWebServer.exe.config BindingURL parameter to "https://+:8082"
3. Restart the Netwrix Web Server Service
---
We also used the certificate to bind the AIC securely to port 443 following the same instructions as above, but on the AccessInformationCenter.service.exe.config file and restarting the Netwrix Access Information Center service
